description: You feel a boost in strength (+3 str) while wearing this particular artifact, it feels not as if you're controlled but guided by an entity or so you think...

You feel that you can endure the hardships of Cataclysm better (+55% to maximal carry weight, -25% to fatigue, slight protection from bleeding) while wearing this particular artifact, it feels not as if you're controlled but guided by an entity or so you think...
You sense a feeling of wielding a weapon while wearing this particular artifact, it feels not as if you're controlled but guided by an entity or so you think...

attacks.attack_text_u: Your artifact shapes into a tentacle which stabs %s violently
